text: Izadkhast (also known as SamÄ«rum) is a city in the Central District of Abadeh County, Fars Province, Iran. At the 2006 census 7,366 people lived there in 1,803 families. There is Izad-Khast Castle, a caravanserai, and a Safavid- period bridge. The site was added to the UNESCO World Heritage Tentative List on August 9, 2007 in the Cultural category. == References == Category:Cities in Abadeh County
title: Izadkhvast
